vsParam:
Yeah, that's how it works.
No problem?

I see.
If so... Yeah, I got it! Thank you!

She's Nelke von Lestamm, one of those who came
from a different world, named "Different Worlder".

As a nobility, she took over the Administrator
of "Westbald Village" from her father.

To develop Westbald Village on the border,
Nelke has been working so hard.

She remains so passionate even
after she came to the Academy——

Hee hee, nice to meet you.
You all look energetic today, which is great.

Exactly~! It's so important to live a healthy life!
Huh? To me, it should be the life of fairies, oh, so wordy...

Forget it, it doesn't matter. Hey, Nelke!
What are you talking with Bergamot Sensei?

It's about alchemy. I asked Bergamot Sensei
about the alchemy in this world.

It's very different from what I knew about it.
And I learned a lot from her!

Hehe, Nelke, you're so hungry for knowledge.
Don't let her overshadow you, [px].
I will not lose to her...!

Don't say that... I've no talent for alchemy,
so I just want to know something about it.

Talent...
Nelke, you don't know alchemy?

No. I've been working on it,
but I can't grasp the essence of it...

Nelke just said, didn't she?
"It's very different from what I knew about it".

Even though you didn't know alchemy in your world,
you may be able to learn it here!

Indeed. But it's not totally impossible.
How about that, Nelke? If you'd like to...
You can join [px] and learn the alchemy in this world?

Yup. [px] is a top student.
I can guarantee [px]'s level of alchemy.

Plus, [px] is about the same age as Nelke. I think it'll
be easier for you two to communicate with each other.

Oh——
I can't believe Bergamot Sensei is like a granny...

No... Nothing!!
So, Nelke! Would you like to try alchemy?

Yeah... Right. It'll be better for Westbald to
have more alchemists for its development.
Besides, I'd like to use alchemy to make items too.
So, please do give me a hand when you're available...

You bet. Deal! Look, [px].
Make sure to teach Nelke how to practice alchemy!

OK, where should we start?
Shall we start with synthesis? Or...

Oh, here you are.
[px], I need to synthesize something...

Oh, perfect timing~!
Good for you, Hazel!!

I'd like to synthesize "Puni Balls" for this event. Could you
do it for me? Ah, don't answer me. I'll count it on you!

Oh, um, Hazel...!?
Oh, she's gone...

Um——forget it, that's totally Hazel's style.
Anyway, we've been waiting for a synthesis chance, perfect.

So, the first step is observation!
[px] will show you how to make "Puni Balls"~!

Show Nelke after you're done.
And Nelke will follow your instruction.

Got it! I'm so looking forward to see
how [px] performs alchemy!
